multiplechoiceresponse.p: What does the following command do?
multiplechoiceresponse.label: Pick one answer

choicegroup.choice: It truncates the stream down to exactly 1000 of the latest messages.
It truncates the stream down to approximately 1000 of the latest messages.
It removes all messages greater than 1000 bytes in length.
It forces the stream to reject messages greater than 1000 bytes in length.

div.p: The XTRIM command is used to truncate a stream to contain either an exact or approximate number of entries. With the ~, it will truncate approximately.
